data.title: Mike Miller Joins The Signorelli Company as Senior Vice President of Land
data.meta_description: The Signorelli Company is pleased to announce Mike Miller has joined the leadership team as Senior Vice President of Land.
data.text:
THE WOODLANDS, TEXAS (February 2, 2021) – The Signorelli Company is pleased to announce Mike Miller has joined the leadership team as Senior Vice President of Land. With the extensive growth The Signorelli Company land division has been experiencing over the last few years, Mike will be a key player in helping manage current assets and further propel the firm’s master planned community footprint across Houston, including recently announced Austin Point, and co-leading current efforts to expand into the Austin, Dallas, and San Antonio markets.

“Mike has joined The Signorelli Company at a most pivotal time. The land division has seen explosive growth over the last 18 months with the addition of several communities such as Austin Point, Chapel Run, and Magnolia Springs,” said The Signorelli Company Chief Operating Officer, Greg Armstrong. “Working alongside existing Senior Vice President Jeff Dewese, Mike will bring his strong leadership skills and extensive experience in master planned community development to help continue to push us forward.”

Prior to joining the award-winning developer, Mike was most recently Vice President - Houston for Ashlar Development, where his responsibilities included all residential and commercial performance for The Groves Master Planned Community.

“I am excited for this momentous opportunity and look forward to being able to contribute to The Signorelli Company’s continued growth in the coming years, “stated Mike. “The company’s strong culture, hardworking team and strive for excellence align greatly with my own personal philosophies.”

Mike graduated from The University of Virginia with a Bachelor of Science in Architecture and a Bachelor of Urban and Environmental Planning. He received his Master of Science in Land and Property Development at Texas A&M University and now serves on the Development Industry Advisory Council for the program. Mike is active in numerous professional and civic organizations. In 2021, he was selected by the Lake Houston Area Magazine as a “Top 4 Under 40”.

###

The Signorelli Company

Since 1994, The Signorelli Company, founded by Danny Signorelli, has pioneered green markets, exemplified vision and creativity in placemaking and developed and built the finest places where families can live, work, shop and play. Diversified in most aspects of real estate, from single-family and multi-family to retail, commercial, land development, and mixed-use projects, The Signorelli Company is recognized as a leader in Texas and is one of the largest privately held development companies in the State of Texas. The company is headquartered in The Woodlands, TX. For more information about The Signorelli Company, visit www.signorellicompany.com or follow the brand via Facebook, Twitter,LinkedIn or Instagram.
